description: Deals with the effects of industrial noise on hearing. Shows ways of preventing this kind of deafness on the factory floor. Good use of comic touches to enliven a very serious and important topic. Cast includes Max Cullen, Brian Duhig, Barry Pierce, John Hale, Keith Jarvis, Barrie Buir, Jack Perry, Richard Meredith, Billie Hammerberg.
